actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the earnings test for individuals who have attained retirement age.
short_title: Social Security Earnings Test Limitation Act of 1987
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Social Security Earnings Test Limitation Act of 1987 - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to remove the limitation on the amount of outside income which beneficiaries who have attained retirement age may earn without incurring a reduction in benefits.

titles.title: Social Security Earnings Test Limitation Act of 1987
A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the earnings test for individuals who have attained retirement age.
